metadata.description: Product hierarchy and variant rules for Technifold solutions
metadata.purpose: Used to determine which product variant to show when multiple options exist

variants.name: Tri-Creaser Advance
variants.usp: First solution to prevent fibre-cracking AND inside-fold toner flaking simultaneously
variants.targetMarket: Digital print operations, laminated stocks, toner-based output
variants.keyFeature: Two-way creasing with specially profiled female receiver ring

variants.name: Tri-Creaser Fast-Fit
variants.usp: Split-ring technology allows crease changes in SECONDS without removing from machine
variants.keyFeature: Patented split creasing ribs lock into hub mechanism

tri-creaser.rule: Show highest available version only. Never show multiple variants for same machine.

variants.name: Standard Quad-Creaser
variants.notes: More affordable, covers most common requirements

quad-creaser.rule: Show both in quotes with comparison if both available for machine

spine-creaser.relationship: Same spine-cracking problem, different machine types

quad-creaser.relationship: Same 4-crease pattern, inline on binders vs spine-creaser (stitchers) or spine-and-hinge (folders)

spine-and-hinge-creaser.relationship: Same 4-crease pattern but for folders/offline workflows

cp-applicator.uniqueFeature: PATENTED - only solution for perfs/creases as close as 5mm apart
